synopsis.text: Episode one of this captivating anime aired on YouTube in December 2020, with regular broadcasts commencing in February 2021. The story follows Mitsugu Bamba, an avid high school blood donor, who regularly visits a blood bank despite the nurse's harsh treatment. One day, she discovers an ethereal, foreign-looking girl at the bank who appears to be on the brink of collapse. Suddenly, the girl unleashes chaos, destroying the blood bank before fainting. Mitsugu takes the girl home, unaware that she is a descendant of a noble vampire lineage. The girl, Mai, is shy and unable to feed on humans, leaving Mitsugu to find alternative ways to provide blood for her new companion. As the story unfolds, Mitsugu enlists the help of her classmates and the school doctor to ensure Mai's survival in this thrilling and heartwarming tale.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
